Name: Changing the days on which the Council can meet to fix the tax rates.
Title: A Local Law in relation to changing the days on which the Council can meet to fix the tax rates.

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Finance
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by Roll Call.
History.AgendaNote: Preconsidered - Coupled on GO with Message of Necessity

History.Description: This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was City Charter Rule Adopted

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
 

Section 1.  For the calendar year two thousand eight and in relation to the tax rate for fiscal year two thousand nine, notwithstanding any inconsistent provisions of section 11-220 of the New York City Administrative Code, the Council may meet on Saturday, Sunday or a legal holiday to fix the annual tax rate.
              ยง2. 	This local law shall take effect immediately and shall be retroactive to 
and be deemed to have been in full force and effect on June twenty-fifth, two thousand eight.




TT6-25-08
LS#5840
